label: uncl3153
comment: Code specifying the type of communication medium.

values.label: Circuit switching
values.comment: A process that, on demand, connects two or more data terminal equipments and permits the exclusive use of a data circuit between them until the connection is released (ISO).

values.label: SITA
values.comment: Communications number assigned by Societe Internationale de Telecommunications Aeronautiques (SITA).

values.label: ARINC
values.comment: Communications number assigned by Aeronautical Radio Inc.

values.label: Courier
values.comment: A communication channel identifying a courier.

values.label: Express post
values.comment: Express (e.g. overnight) postal service document delivery.

values.label: Cable address
values.comment: The cable is used as communication medium.

values.label: EDI transmission
values.comment: Number identifying the service and service user.

values.label: Electronic mail
values.comment: Exchange of mail by electronic means.

values.label: Extension
values.comment: Telephone extension.

values.label: File transfer access method
values.comment: According to ISO.

values.label: Telefax
values.comment: Device used for transmitting and reproducing fixed graphic material (as printing) by means of signals over telephone lines or other electronic transmission media.

values.label: GEIS (General Electric Information Service) mailbox
values.comment: GEIS mailbox system is used as communication medium.

values.label: IBM information exchange
values.comment: IBM IE is used as communication medium.

values.label: Internal mail
values.comment: Internal mail address/number.

values.label: Mail
values.comment: Postal service document delivery.

values.label: Postbox no.
values.comment: Postbox system is used as communication medium.

values.label: Packet switching
values.comment: The process of routing and transferring data by means of addressed packets so that a channel is occupied only during the transmission; upon completion of the transmission the channel is made available for the transfer of other packets (ISO).

values.label: S.W.I.F.T.
values.comment: Communications address assigned by Society for Worldwide Interbank Financial Telecommunications s.c.

values.label: Telephone
values.comment: Voice/data transmission by telephone.

values.label: Telegraph
values.comment: Text transmission via telegraph.

values.label: Telex
values.comment: Transmission of text/data via telex.

values.label: Telemail
values.comment: Transmission of text/data via telemail.

values.label: Teletext
values.comment: Transmission of text/data via teletext.

values.label: TWX
values.comment: Communication service involving Teletypewriter machines connected by wire or electronic transmission media. Teletypewriter machines are the devices used to send and receive signals and produce hardcopy from them.

values.label: X.400
values.comment: CCITT Message handling system.
